item.title: Anointing Of The Sick
item.description: “Are any among you sick? They should call for the elders of the church and have them pray over them, anointing them with oil in the name of the Lord.

item.title: Anointing Of The Sick
item.description: “Are any among you sick? They should call for the elders of the church and have them pray over them, anointing them with oil in the name of the Lord.

item.title: Baptism
item.description: “Go therefore and make disciples of all nations, baptising them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, - Matthew 28:19” What is Baptism?

item.title: Confirmation
item.description: “All of them were filled with the Holy Spirit and began to speak in other languages, as the Spirit gave them ability.

item.title: First Communion
item.description: “I am the living bread that came down from heaven.

item.description: “I am the living bread that came down from heaven.

item.title: Holy Orders
item.description: And he said to them, “Follow me, and I will make you fish for people.

item.title: Matrimony
item.description: “Therefore a man leaves his father and his mother and clings to his wife, and they become one flesh.

item.title: Matrimony
item.description: “Therefore a man leaves his father and his mother and clings to his wife, and they become one flesh.

item.title: Reconciliation
item.description: “all this is from God, who reconciled us to himself through Christ, and has given us the ministry of reconciliation - 2 Corinthians 5:18” What does Confirmation Mean?

item.title: Reconciliation
item.description: “all this is from God, who reconciled us to himself through Christ, and has given us the ministry of reconciliation - 2 Corinthians 5:18” What does Confirmation Mean?

item.title: 送給正處於逆境或低谷中的朋友們的聖言
item.description: 有上主保護我，我不畏懼；人能對我怎樣？ （希13：6） 一切都在天主手中，祂始終保護著我們，我們何必害怕呢？不要害怕任何不好的事或人，因為他們即使再大，也大不過天主。 為義而受迫害是有福的，因為天國是他們的。 （瑪5：10） 我們或多或少都曾因為信仰的緣故遭遇到大大小小的困難，但遇到困難時就請喜樂吧，因為這是天主對我們的考驗。 若你們在地上同心合意，無論為什麼事祈禱，我在天之父，必要給他們成就。 (瑪18：19) 天主是我們在天上的父親，祂絕不會對自己的兒女不管不問，即使我們的祈禱不是很快應驗，但天主一定會為我們預備未來。 你們什麼也不要掛慮，只在一事上，以懇求和祈禱，懷著感謝之心，向天主呈上你們的請求。 (斐4：6)
